name: The Third Power
description:
The Third Power is a minimalist puzzle game inspired by Metroidvanias, Outer Wilds, and The Witness.  It was developed by Cort Stratton using quadplay✜ for OST Jam Vol. 4

It was also not finished during the game, so what you can play here is a combination of a proof-of-concept for the basic mechanics and an interactive teaser. I hope it gives a general sense of the game while I finish the real level design.

Featuring music by Abstraction
